item.title: Dong'an Upgrade and reform!
item.description: var playerElement = document.getElementById("player-wrapper"); var player = new Clappr.Player({ source: "/Story 1/Video/Story 1 Video.mp4", height: 360, width: 640, }); player.attachTo(playerElement); At the end of this year, the time-honored Dong’an Department Store located on Wangfujing Street will close temporarily for upgrading into a fashion selected shop with fashion theme blocks. The Dong’an Department Store, which was built in 1903, has a history of more than 100 years.
